private boolean shallSkipZscriptWiring()

Issue #146 - Support for skip zscript wiring for better performance. 1st look at variable skipZscriptWiring on composer 2nd look at global config skipZscriptWiring on Config.

onEvent

@Override
public void onEvent(org.zkoss.zk.ui.event.Event evt)

Overrides GenericEventListener to use InvokerHelper to call methods. Because of this the events are now part of groovy's dynamic methods, e.g. metaClass.invokeMethod works for event methods. Without this the default java code don't call the overriden invokeMethod

throws:
Exception
Parameters:
evt

setDesktopCounter

public void setDesktopCounter(DesktopCounter dc)

shallSkipZscriptWiring

private boolean shallSkipZscriptWiring()
Issue #146 - Support for skip zscript wiring for better performance. 1st look at variable skipZscriptWiring on composer 2nd look at global config skipZscriptWiring on Config. If none specified default to true (wire zscript variables) maintaining backward compatibility
